body:
@jacobsa that commit eedaf9ac8b3a7b91d9a033d902b00eccf185d36f is not on master. (And [CL 13020]( https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/13020/) is abandoned?)

Also, is your change superseded by [CL 10484](https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/10484/), which went in a couple of months ago? Or would it still be helpful for GCM-with-a-non-AES-block-cipher? (Is that a thing?)
